plot: Daisy hides from her father but it's not her father she's scared of. It's the grinding man. He's always there, with the grey stone dust on his hands and the sound of his foot on the stairs....
title: The Boy with Blue Eyes
plot_es: Daisy hides from her father but it's not her father she's scared of. It's the grinding man. He's always there, with the grey stone dust on his hands and the sound of his foot on the stairs....
